name: Admin Console Release 24.3.3
description: This release of the Admin Console brings you a few enhancements and a few bug fixes, see below for details on some of the more notable changes applied to the Admin Console.

IMPROVED.text: Removed Kaixin and RenRen Social providers from the Admin Console .
Empty string value is supported in Segmentation under Admin Console .
Password Complexity has been added in the Admin Console .

FIXED.text: Webhook URLs subscriptions in Admin Console now allow up to 5 URLs.
Updated the default scopes for Disqus social ID providers.
You can now update the Profile fields for the profiles where Email does not exist via the Admin Console .
